name: Ground
description: In response to an attack that deals electric damage occuring within a very short (5 unit) radius of you, you attempt to act as a ground and absorb it. If you are the only target of the effect, the damage is halved before applying mitigation. If there are other creatures within the area making a defense check against the effect, they take only half of the total damage dealt, and you take the other half.
charge: The ground extends to a short (10 unit) radius and your allies take no damage, but you still take half for each creature within the area who would have taken electric damage.
